title: Spotify's new feature keeps Peppa Pig away from your heavy metal playlist
description: Coming to mobile devices and desktops, Exclude from your Taste Profile keeps Spotify playlists free of outside influence.

title: A Spider-Man Noir TV show is in the works for Prime Video
description: Amazon is developing a live-action Spider-Man Noir series for its streaming platform.

title: These mods for popular online game Dota 2 contain malware
description: Dota 2 has had some malicious mods taken down, resulting in an update that may not work on your older Mac.

title: This is now the best encryption method for IoT devices, experts claim
description: A four-year process to find an effective encryption method for less powerful devices has yielded a winner.

title: It sounds like Garmin may copy the Apple Watch with a yearly Forerunner release
description: Garmin Forerunner 965 & 265 could land in a matter of months, but fans won't be happy.

title: Major quantum computing breakthrough could mean the revolution is here
description: A team of scientists at Sussex University think they have overcome a major hurdle in the nascent field with top quantum computing speeds.

title: Adobe Acrobat to power Microsoft Edge's free PDF reader
description: Adobe and Microsoft partnership means Edge will get an upgraded PDF reader powered by the Acrobat engine.

title: Wix site owners can now access Google Search Console from its SEO dashboard
description: Dashboard provides Wix users with SEO tools, insights and reports from Google Search Console.

title: Watch out, TweetDeck users—Elon Musk is about to ruin your Twitter experience
description: TweetDeck will soon be placed behind Twitter Blue paywall, and that’s just awful.

title: It might be impossible now to recover data from VMware ransomware attacks
description: The flawed encryptor is fixed and the decryption script no longer works.

title: Over a million Weee! customers have had their data breached
description: The data, including email addresses, is being leaked on an underground forum.

title: VPN downloads soar in Turkey as government blocks Twitter
description: Proton VPN recorded hourly sign-ups exceeding 30,000% above normal levels, stressing the need for a free internet in time of crisis.

title: Google Bard's first costly error shows AI chatbots aren't yet ready for prime time
description: Google's AI-assisted search engine tool has made an embarrassing blunder – here's why it matters.

title: Apple TV is coming to more cheap TVs, thanks to LG
description: The streaming app from Apple is now set to land on webOS Hub platform, which is sold by LG to other TV makers.

title: Web content filtering doesn't work on Windows 11, SonicWall says
description: The latest Win 11 patch broke web filtering, but the company is working on a fix.

title: Microsoft admits Windows 11 has a nasty bug that crashes games
description: This is an unpleasant affair for some gamers with Intel GPUs, but the good news is a fix is inbound.

title: The DJI Mini 2 SE is an affordable beginner drone that you can fly further
description: DJI has launched the Mini 2 SE, a sub-250g drone that has a longer range than its predecessor and a newer controller.

title: Google's ChatGPT rival Bard is already off to a terrible start, company shares tumble
description: Google is struggling to keep up in the wake of Microsoft’s huge ChatGPT success, and its a little bit embarrassing.

title: Disney Plus loses its magic touch as millions cancel their subscriptions
description: Disney Plus has suffered the first major loss of subscribers in its history.

title: Intel is discontinuing its 11th-gen CPUs - but don’t panic-upgrade just yet
description: Intel calls time on its Rocket Lake processors just shy of their second birthday.

title: Netflix password-sharing is looking more expensive than we realized
description: Netflix's paid account sharing has arrived - here's what the changes mean for people in the US, UK, and Australia.

title: Sennheiser HD 660 S2 headphones are a sound upgrade to a modern classic
description: Updated high-end open-back flagship headphones feature boosted low-end and improved frequency response.

title: Microsoft wants to help companies create their own ChatGPT
description: Microsoft is pushing ChatGPT everywhere it can, and it may soon offer customizable chatbots for businesses.

title: Viziogram is Instagram, but for 4K TVs
description: Vizio's latest SmartCast feature is a phone app-based scheme for sending pictures and videos to the company's TVs.

title: World’s fastest CPU gets huge price drop, weeks after it launched but why?
description: AMD’s EPYC 9654 can be had for less than $8300, a steep discount from its suggested retail price

title: ChatGPT is again being used to create malicious content
description: Crooks quickly found a way around early restrictions and improved the code of an old infostealer.

title: The Xiaomi 13 and Xiaomi 13 Pro are going global very soon
description: Xiaomi has confirmed that the Xiaomi 13 series will launch globally in late February.

title: Top mobile finance app Money Lover has some worrying security flaws
description: It's leaking sensitive data, including email addresses.
